Package io.mrshannon.hexmek.models

Interface Component

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Damageable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullComponent, RealComponent
    public interface Component
extends Damageable
    Components are the parts of units that have armour and weapons.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getArmour()
      Get current armour.
      int getMaxArmour()
      Get maximum (initial) armour value.
      String getType()
      Get the component type.
      List<Weapon> getWeapons()
      Get list of weapons in the component.
      boolean isDestroyed()
      Determine if component is destroyed
